title: Bachelor Peter’s Parents Barbara and Pete Sr.
description:
America’s favorite Bachelor Nation parents, Barbara and Peter Sr., open up about Bachelor Peter being “super shy” when he was younger. Plus, they reveal the last thing Peter said to them before walking out the door to do the show. And — big Bachelor Happy Hour news! Rachel reveals her new, official co-host!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
